select q.*, u.*, qa.*, lc.*, qas.* from COM_QUESTION q left join (SYS_USER u, COM_AUTHOR_QUESTION_MAP aqm) on q.QUES_ID = aqm.QUES_ID and u.USER_ID = aqm.USER_ID and u.IS_DELETE = 0 left join (COM_QUESTION_ATTENTION qa, COM_QUESTION_ATTENTION_MAP qam) on qam.QUES_ID = q.QUES_ID and qa.ATTEN_ID = qam.ATTEN_ID and qa.ATTEN_CANCEL = 0 left join (SYS_COM_LABEL_CLASS lc, COM_QUESTION_LABEL_MAP qlm) on qlm.QUES_ID = q.QUES_ID and lc.LAB_NUM = qlm.LAB_NUM and lc.START_STATUS = 1 left join (COM_QUESTION_ANSWER qas, COM_QUESTION_ANSWER_MAP qasm) on qasm.QUES_ID = q.QUES_ID and qas.ANSWER_ID = qasm.ANSWER_ID and qas.IS_DELETE = 0 where q.QUES_ID = #{ques_id} and q.IS_DELETE = 0

select qas.*, u.*, ac.*, ae.* from COM_QUESTION_ANSWER qas left join SYS_USER u on u.USER_ID = qas.USER_ID and u.IS_DELETE = 0 left join (COM_ANSWER_COMMENT ac, COM_ANSWER_COMMENT_MAP acm) on acm.ANSWER_ID = qas.ANSWER_ID and ac.COMMENT_ID = acm.COMMENT_ID and ac.IS_DELETE = 0 left join (COM_ANSWER_EVALUATE ae, COM_ANSWER_EVALUATE_MAP aem) on ae.EVALUATE_ID = aem.EVALUATE_ID and aem.ANSWER_ID = qas.ANSWER_ID where qas.ANSWER_ID = #{answer_id} and qas.IS_DELETE = 0

select ac.*, u.*, ace.*, acd.* from COM_ANSWER_COMMENT ac left join SYS_USER u on u.USER_ID = ac.USER_ID and u.IS_DELETE = 0 left join (COM_COMMENT_DISCUSS acd, COM_COMMENT_DISCUSS_MAP cdm) on cdm.COMMENT_ID = ac.COMMENT_ID and acd.DISCUSS_ID = cdm.DISCUSS_ID and acd.IS_DELETE = 0 left join (COM_COMMENT_EVALUATE ace, COM_COMMENT_EVALUATE_MAP cem) on cem.COMMENT_ID = ac.COMMENT_ID and ace.EVALUATE_ID = cem.EVALUATE_ID where ac.COMMENT_ID = #{comment_id} and ac.IS_DELETE = 0

select cd.*, u.*, de.* from COM_COMMENT_DISCUSS cd left join SYS_USER u on u.USER_ID = cd.USER_ID and u.IS_DELETE = 0 left join (COM_DISCUSS_EVALUATE de, COM_DISCUSS_EVALUATE_MAP dem) on dem.DISCUSS_ID = cd.DISCUSS_ID and de.EVALUATE_ID = dem.EVALUATE_ID where cd.DISCUSS_ID = #{discuss_id} and cd.IS_DELETE = 0

select v.*, u.*, ve.*, vc.*, va.* from COM_USER_VIDEO v left join (SYS_USER u, COM_USER_VIDEO_MAP uvm) on uvm.VIDEO_ID = v.VIDEO_ID and uvm.USER_ID = u.USER_ID and u.IS_DELETE = 0 left join (COM_VIDEO_ATTENTION va, COM_VIDEO_ATTENTION_MAP vam) on vam.VIDEO_ID = v.VIDEO_ID and vam.ATTEN_ID = va.ATTEN_ID and va.ATTEN_CANCEL = 0 left join (COM_VIDEO_COMMENT vc, COM_VIDEO_COMMENT_MAP vcm) on vcm.VIDEO_ID = v.VIDEO_ID and vcm.COMMENT_ID = vc.COMMENT_ID and vc.IS_DELETE = 0 left join (COM_VIDEO_EVALUATE ve, COM_VIDEO_EVALUATE_MAP vem) on vem.VIDEO_ID = v.VIDEO_ID and vem.EVALUATE_ID = ve.EVALUATE_ID where v.VIDEO_ID = #{video_id} and v.IS_DELETE = 0
